title: Toys for Tots CEO on Being ’Blessed’ With Support
itunes:title: Toys for Tots CEO on Being ’Blessed’ With Support
description:
Retired Marine Corps Lieutenant General Pete Osman, CEO of the Toys for Tots Foundation, talks about their 72nd annual toy drive. He says corporate donors like Disney are "amazing."

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Paul Brennan

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
